concept.title: Kerberos Authentication
concept.shortdesc: You can use Kerberos authentication to connect to HDFS. When you use Kerberos authentication the uses the Kerberos principal and keytab to connect to HDFS.

conbody.p: Hadoop FS originKerberos authenticationHadoop FS destinationKerberos authenticationKerberos authenticationusing for HDFSThe Kerberos principal and keytab are defined in the configuration file. To use Kerberos authentication, configure all Kerberos properties in the configuration file.
